meanings: (웃기다, 재미있다) funny, humorous, amusing, comic(al), hilarious

vlive.korean: 요리를 우습게 보고 앉아있어 - 으이그~ You think cooking is easy. - Whew~ 듣기 View video 슈주 리턴즈 (SJ returns) : [슈주 리턴즈 : 스핀오프] 특규 리턴즈 픽쿡크라운 EP01
vlive.english: You think cooking is easy. - Whew~

vlive.korean: 우습게 질투도 했어~ I've been jealous too~ 듣기 View video Hidden Track No.V : [Replay] Hidden Track No.V 아이콘 X 새소년 X O.O.O 체크인라이브
날 우습게 보나 본데 너 나 못이겨. You must think very little of me, but you can't beat me. 듣기 View video GFRIEND : 🦊🐥
vlive.english: You must think very little of me, but you can't beat me.

vlive.korean: 내 것만 우습게 나왔네. I came out funny compared to hers. 듣기 View video DIA : [DIA] 책 읽어주는 채연이♡
vlive.english: I came out funny compared to hers.

vlive.korean: GyeoUl이 형들 보기를 아주 우습게 알고 있어서요. Because he has no respect on us. 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : VAV - Very Awesome VAV ' 주위의 사람들 신경은 쓰지마 VAV만 바라봐 '
vlive.english: Because he has no respect on us.

examples.korean: Funnily enough, a big truck got wedged under an overpass. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우습게도 큰 트럭이 육교 아래 끼었습니다. 절대어휘 5100

examples.korean: The intelligent man finds almost everything ridiculous, the sensible man hardly anything. (Johann Wolfgang von Goethe) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 영리한 사람은 거의 모든 것을 우습게 보지만, 분별있는 사람은 아무것도 우습게 보지 않는다. (요한 볼프강 폰 괴테, 지혜명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: The intelligent man finds almost everything ridiculous, the sensible man hardly anything. (Johann Wolfgang von Goethe) Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: At the risk of seeming ridiculous, let me say that the true revolutionary is guided by a great feeling of love. It is impossible to think of a genuine revolutionary lacking this quality. (Ernesto "Che" Guevara) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우습게 들릴지 모르지만, 진정한 혁명가를 이끄는 것은 위대한 사랑의 감정이다, 이런 자질이 없는 혁명가는 생각할 수 없다. (체 게바라, 사랑명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: At the risk of seeming ridiculous, let me say that the true revolutionary is guided by a great feeling of love. It is impossible to think of a genuine revolutionary lacking this quality. (Ernesto "Che" Guevara) Add to Wordbook
